translated: and the blood of a great crow, one should draw the seed of wind in the center of the wheel with twelve spokes, twelve finger breadths in size.

original: de'i khongs su dgra'i ming rnam par bcad pa dang bcas ba kha sbyar la /
analyzed: de'i khongs su dgra'i ming rnam par bcad pa dang bcas ba kha sbyar la /
translated: Within that, one should write the name of the enemy, and having sealed it,

original: bya rog gi mgrin pa la bcings nas gal te ma bkrol ba de'i tshe tshar gcod do //
analyzed: bya rog gi mgrin pa la bcings nas gal te ma bkrol ba de'i tshe tshar gcod do //
translated: one should tie it around the neck of a crow. If it is not released, then it is destroyed.

original: de'i tshe tshar ma chod na de las bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshar ma chod na de las bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: If it is not destroyed at that time, then one should write the twelve seed syllables.

original: phat phat h'um h'um na na t'a kri bi sht'i:hr'i:aom//
analyzed: phat phat h'um h'um na na t'a kri bi sht'i:hr'i:aom//
translated: Phaṭ phaṭ hūṃ hūṃ na na tā kri viśva hriḥ oṃ.

original: ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas stobs po che sa gdug pa byin nas gal te rgyun la bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas stobs po che sa gdug pa byin nas gal te rgyun la bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Having made offerings of whatever is available, one should give the earth to Mahābala. If one wants to expel [someone], one should write [the name] on birch bark.

original: gal te ma yin na khva ta'i gshog pa la lan bdun du bsngags te khyim gyi sgo ru ming nas smos na 'phral du skrod par byed de de tshar gcod do //
analyzed: gal te ma yin na khva ta'i gshog pa la lan bdun du bsngags te khyim gyi sgo ru ming nas smos na 'phral du skrod par byed de de tshar gcod do //
translated: If one does not, one should enchant a crow's wing seven times and, by calling out the name, expel [the person] immediately at the door of the house.

original: de bzhin du rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / rus pa chen po dang / bud shing gi me'i sa bon gyi dbus su rnam par bcad pa dang bcas pa'i ya @477b yig gnyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis kyis phyi rol nas bskor te me'i shing gi ma la gdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / rus pa chen po dang / bud shing gi me'i sa bon gyi dbus su rnam par bcad pa dang bcas pa'i ya @477b yig gnyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis kyis phyi rol nas bskor te me'i shing gi ma la gdung bar bya'o //
translated: Similarly, in the center of a wheel with twelve spokes, one should write the two syllables ya and ya, with the three hot substances, poison, black mustard seeds, and great bone, in the center of a fire of firewood. Having cut [the wheel] in half, one should burn it with a fire of dhak wood.

original: de bu khye'u'i steng du bzung na de'i skad cig la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bu khye'u'i steng du bzung na de'i skad cig la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one holds it over the head of a child, he will die instantly.

original: gal te ma yin na mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags par byas nas dgra'i sgor zla bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te ma yin na mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags par byas nas dgra'i sgor zla bar bya'o //
translated: If not, one should enchant four finger-breadths of human bone seven times and bury it at the door of the enemy.

original: de yis khyim nas skrod par byed do //
analyzed: de yis khyim nas skrod par byed do //
translated: He will be expelled from his house.

original: de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis yongs su gyur pas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsandan la dzi wa dang / kashthi ka dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'am 'khri shing gi chu'i sa bon gyi dbus su de nyid gnyis kyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis phyi rol du bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis yongs su gyur pas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsandan la dzi wa dang / kashthi ka dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'am 'khri shing gi chu'i sa bon gyi dbus su de nyid gnyis kyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis phyi rol du bskor bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should make a wheel with twelve spokes from the twelve seeds, in the middle of which one should place, in the middle of a seed of jīva, kṣīrika, or akṣobhya, or in the middle of the water of a creeper, that very [wheel] with the two syllables TA and YA reversed.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
translated: One should enchant it one hundred and eight times.

original: 'o mas bkang bzhin du r'a dz'a ta dang me tog dmar po 'bum phrag gcig la 'chi ba med cing de las gzhan du yang r'a dz'a ta de'i dngos po 'gro pa med do //
analyzed: 'o mas bkang bzhin du r'a dz'a ta dang me tog dmar po 'bum phrag gcig la 'chi ba med cing de las gzhan du yang r'a dz'a ta de'i dngos po 'gro pa med do //
translated: One should fill it with milk and with one hundred thousand flowers of rājāt and red flowers. One will become immortal. And it will not go away from that place.

original: de'i tshe bdag nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bdag nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, even one who has committed the five acts of immediate retribution will be freed.

original: yang na shing se pha la'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa lta ba'i me tog dmar po rnams kyis de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis kyis yongs su gang ba'i kham phor du bzhag nas bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na shing se pha la'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa lta ba'i me tog dmar po rnams kyis de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis kyis yongs su gang ba'i kham phor du bzhag nas bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Or, having placed the seed syllables in a bowl filled with the twelve seeds, one should recite the mantra with red flowers like the blossoms of the coral tree.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdul dka' ba'i mi dang / mi bdag rgyal po la sogs pa rnams @478a *//
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdul dka' ba'i mi dang / mi bdag rgyal po la sogs pa rnams @478a *//
translated: The gods, asuras, kinnaras, mahoragas, nāgas, ḍākas, ḍākinīs, yakṣas, rākṣasas, and the difficult-to-tame humans,

original: 'bangs dang 'bangs mo'i dngos po 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: 'bangs dang 'bangs mo'i dngos po 'gro bar byed do //
translated: the kings, and so forth, will be brought under one's control.

original: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi zhi ba can la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi zhi ba can la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the third chapter, the chapter on the rites of the common pacification and so forth, of this Tantra of Red Yamāri.

original: de nas mnga' bdag dam 'khyung cing //
analyzed: de nas mnga' bdag dam 'khyung cing //
translated: Then, the Lord, having made a solemn promise,

original: tshems kyis ma mchu 'tshir mdzad pa //
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu 'tshir mdzad pa //
translated: biting his lower lip,

original: de la bdag med mas sems can //
analyzed: de la bdag med mas sems can //
translated: to him Nairātmyā, for the sake of sentient beings,

original: don phyir phan byung zhus pa ni //
analyzed: don phyir phan byung zhus pa ni //
translated: asked for the benefit:

original: bcom ldan ji ltar sems can rnams //
analyzed: bcom ldan ji ltar sems can rnams //
translated: Blessed One, how are sentient beings?

original: ji ltar rgyal po rnams su 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal po rnams su 'gyur //
translated: And how do they become kings?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: lha mo ngo mchog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lha mo ngo mchog pa'i phyir //
translated: Goddess, for the sake of the best,🔽I will explain to you, so listen.

original: khyod la bshad par bya yi nyon; ;ya yig dang ba yig dag las kyang gzhan du skar ma rgyal gyi gzhi pa la la btika byed du bcug la skar ma rgyal las sa gsum po bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod la bshad par bya yi nyon; ;ya yig dang ba yig dag las kyang gzhan du skar ma rgyal gyi gzhi pa la la btika byed du bcug la skar ma rgyal las sa gsum po bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: From the letters ya and va, one should have a base of the constellation Pushya prepared, and from the constellation Pushya, the three grounds should be accomplished.

original: rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi khyim lnga ru gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi khyim lnga ru gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
translated: In the five houses of the royal caste, one should recite the mantra one thousand times.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rdo rje nyid ma bsang gtor dang / rang gi gsang sngags sgrub pa ni sngon du khri bzlas pa'i sgrub pa las so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rdo rje nyid ma bsang gtor dang / rang gi gsang sngags sgrub pa ni sngon du khri bzlas pa'i sgrub pa las so //
translated: The Vajra Goddess Yoginī's bali offering and one's own mantra practice are from the preliminary ten thousand recitations.

original: gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang / bee d'urya dang / m'a li ka la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig dang / de bzhin du bcu'i cha shas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang / bee d'urya dang / m'a li ka la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig dang / de bzhin du bcu'i cha shas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: For gold, silver, coral, lapis lazuli, and pearl, one should perform one hundred thousand recitations and likewise ten parts of the burnt offering.

original: rdo rje'i sa la 'bad pa las slar yang /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sa la 'bad pa las slar yang /
translated: On the vajra ground, having made effort again,

original: tam bam ci pam ram/
analyzed: tam bam ci pam ram/
translated: tam, vam, ci, pam, ram,

original: phyogs rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: one should arrange them in the directions.

original: dbus su rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gsang sngags la brtson pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor @478b pas gang sngags kyi lha'i bdag nyid rnams la nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pa rnams kyis dang / phyogs bzhir rdo rje thod pa rnams su yang dag par gang ba'i gtor ma byas te phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma byas nas de bzhin du bgegs la phur pa dang //
analyzed: dbus su rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gsang sngags la brtson pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor @478b pas gang sngags kyi lha'i bdag nyid rnams la nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pa rnams kyis dang / phyogs bzhir rdo rje thod pa rnams su yang dag par gang ba'i gtor ma byas te phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma byas nas de bzhin du bgegs la phur pa dang //
translated: In the center, with all ornaments, the yogin who is diligent in mantra, equipoised, having made offerings of the five personal belongings to the nature of the mantra deity, and in the four directions, having made the bali offering filled with vajra skull cups, having made the bali offering outside, likewise, with the kīla of obstacles,

original: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byung ba'i dbyug pa rnams kyis 'gyings pa dang bcas pas gsang sngags klog go //
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byung ba'i dbyug pa rnams kyis 'gyings pa dang bcas pas gsang sngags klog go //
translated: and with staffs arisen from the wood of the sacrificial post, with haughtiness, one should recite the mantra.

original: phyi rol du yang de nyid do //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang de nyid do //
translated: Outside, it is the same.

original: ngos bzhi'i phyi rol tu bram pam gram shing /
analyzed: ngos bzhi'i phyi rol tu bram pam gram shing /
translated: Outside the four sides, bhrum, tram, kṣmam, kṣaum,

original: gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro pas dril bu dkrol te /
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro pas dril bu dkrol te /
translated: having given the bali offering, having rung the bell,

original: de bzhin du klog par byed pa'i klog pa po dang / sgrub pa po bzhis gar byed pa la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du klog par byed pa'i klog pa po dang / sgrub pa po bzhis gar byed pa la brtson pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the four who are engaged in the practice of reading, the reader, the practitioner, the dancer, and the one who is intent on the dance,

original: nyams pa dang 'gog pa zhes so //
analyzed: nyams pa dang 'gog pa zhes so //
translated: are said to be the fallen and the stopped.

original: s'a lu la sogs pa lnga bza' ba dang / bza' ba ma yin pa dang bcas pa med do zhes pa bsod nams rnam bzhi shes par bya'o //
analyzed: s'a lu la sogs pa lnga bza' ba dang / bza' ba ma yin pa dang bcas pa med do zhes pa bsod nams rnam bzhi shes par bya'o //
translated: The five, rice, etc., are not to be eaten, nor is what is not food. One should know the four merits.

original: ji ltar dbye bar shes par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar dbye bar shes par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: How is it not to be known as a division?

original: yongs su gang ba'i thod pa ru chang gi btung ba cung zad bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su gang ba'i thod pa ru chang gi btung ba cung zad bya'o //
translated: In the skull filled with liquor, one should drink a little of the liquor.

original: thab tu yang blo dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: thab tu yang blo dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: In the hearth, the wise one should perform the fire sacrifice.

original: ji ltar gsang sngags mnyam par gzhag pas dpa' bo'i dbang po nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gsang sngags mnyam par gzhag pas dpa' bo'i dbang po nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: In this way, the mantra practitioner, equipoised, should accomplish the state of the Lord of Heroes.

original: de nas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na gal te 'dod na phyi rol gyi thun mong gi 'khor los sgyur ba thob bo //
analyzed: de nas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na gal te 'dod na phyi rol gyi thun mong gi 'khor los sgyur ba thob bo //
translated: Then, having performed a hundred thousand fire sacrifices, if one desires, one obtains the external common universal sovereignty.

original: 'di nyid kyis nyis 'gyur gyis 'gyur ba 'dir the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis nyis 'gyur gyis 'gyur ba 'dir the tshom med do //
translated: By this very [number] doubled, there is no doubt here [about the attainment of] the state of a hero.

original: de nas lha mos gsol pa phra mo'i rgyal srid thob pa la dgra 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas lha mos gsol pa phra mo'i rgyal srid thob pa la dgra 'byung ngo //
translated: Then the goddess said, “In the attainment of the sovereignty of the subtle, enemies arise.

original: thabs ches mang po ci @479a *//
analyzed: thabs ches mang po ci @479a *//
translated: By what means,

original: yis lha'i dbang po yid kyi shing rta yang dag par rdzogs par 'gro ba lags /
analyzed: yis lha'i dbang po yid kyi shing rta yang dag par rdzogs par 'gro ba lags /
translated: O Lord of the Gods, is the mind-chariot of the perfect and complete going of beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: gal te snying rje dang ldan pa sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur pa dang / gal te dge 'dun mchod pa'i tshogs kyi bza' bar bya ba yang rjes su nyin rer byed pa dang / de'i don yang bya ste /
analyzed: gal te snying rje dang ldan pa sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur pa dang / gal te dge 'dun mchod pa'i tshogs kyi bza' bar bya ba yang rjes su nyin rer byed pa dang / de'i don yang bya ste /
translated: “If one is compassionate and fulfills the wishes of beings, and if one also daily performs the offerings to the Saṅgha, and if one also acts for their sake,

original: sems can mchod par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can mchod par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be worshipped by beings.

original: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas dang por dbang bskur bar bya ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas dang por dbang bskur bar bya ste /
translated: One who is diligent in mantra meditation should first be initiated.

original: rang gi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i gsang ba'i sngags rab tu sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i gsang ba'i sngags rab tu sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give the secret mantra of the essence and the essence of the heart.

original: thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ba byin nas ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ba byin nas ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
translated: In the three periods of the day, one should offer the sixty-four sacrificial oblations, and do as prescribed.

original: bya ba'i rang bzhin des sems can mchod da ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i rang bzhin des sems can mchod da ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: By this nature of action, one should worship sentient beings as prescribed.

original: bkod pa lnga bya ste /
analyzed: bkod pa lnga bya ste /
translated: One should perform the fivefold array.

original: gsang bar byas nas rang gi mchod sbyin gyi mthar gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsang bar byas nas rang gi mchod sbyin gyi mthar gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Having made it secret, one should offer the sacrificial oblation at the end of one's own sacrifice.

original: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas rnal 'byor ma bzhis mchod pa mang po dang dbang bskur bar yang bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas rnal 'byor ma bzhis mchod pa mang po dang dbang bskur bar yang bya'o //
translated: One who is diligent in the contemplation of mantra should also perform the many offerings and empowerments of the four yoginis.

original: rgyan lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rgyan lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the five ornaments,🔽always with much intoxicant,

original: rtag tu myos byed mang po dang // gri gug dang ni thod par ldan //
analyzed: rtag tu myos byed mang po dang // gri gug dang ni thod par ldan //
translated: endowed with a hooked knife and a skull-cup,🔽everywhere with a tiger-skin skirt,

original: kun tu stag lpags sham thabs dang / s'a li rnams kyis kha bkang nas //
analyzed: kun tu stag lpags sham thabs dang / s'a li rnams kyis kha bkang nas //
translated: one should fill one's mouth with sāli rice,

original: kha nas kha yi nang du sbyin //
analyzed: kha nas kha yi nang du sbyin //
translated: and give it from mouth to mouth.

original: sgrub po gcig ni rgyal kun brgyan //🔽g-yon pas dril bu dkrol byed cing //
analyzed: sgrub po gcig ni rgyal kun brgyan // g-yon pas dril bu dkrol byed cing //
translated: The single adept is adorned with all the victors.🔽With the left hand one should ring the bell,

original: g-yas nyid rdo rje gsor bar byed //
analyzed: g-yas nyid rdo rje gsor bar byed //
translated: and with the right hand one should flourish the vajra.

original: khu @479b lnga yi ni tshad kyis ni //
analyzed: khu @479b lnga yi ni tshad kyis ni //
translated: The five colors are the measure.🔽One should draw the five images,

original: bris sku lnga po gyis shig dang // gti mug phra ma 'dod chags dang // phrag dog kha dog dbye las bri //
analyzed: bris sku lnga po gyis shig dang // gti mug phra ma 'dod chags dang // phrag dog kha dog dbye las bri //
translated: the colors of delusion, slander, desire, and envy.

original: dkar po ser dmar sngo bsangs rnams //
analyzed: dkar po ser dmar sngo bsangs rnams //
translated: White, yellow, red, and dark blue,

original: rang rang gzugs la bri bar bya //
analyzed: rang rang gzugs la bri bar bya //
translated: one should draw them in their respective forms.

original: dbus su gshin rje'i gshed bri'o //
analyzed: dbus su gshin rje'i gshed bri'o //
translated: In the center one should draw Yamântaka.

original: sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba yis //🔽sprang chen snag tsha byas nas ni //
analyzed: sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba yis // sprang chen snag tsha byas nas ni //
translated: One who is devoted to the supreme mantra🔽should make ink from great beggars

original: mchog gi rus pas bri bar bya //
analyzed: mchog gi rus pas bri bar bya //
translated: and draw with the bone of a supreme one.

original: aa yig dang ni ba yig dag 'bum phrag bzhi po yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: aa yig dang ni ba yig dag 'bum phrag bzhi po yang dag rdzogs //
translated: The letter A and the letter Va are completely perfect in the four hundred thousands.

original: thab khung gru gsum pa'i dbus su //
analyzed: thab khung gru gsum pa'i dbus su //
translated: In the center of a triangular hearth,

original: sbyin sreg sngags la mchog gzhol ba //
analyzed: sbyin sreg sngags la mchog gzhol ba //
translated: one who is devoted to the supreme mantra of fire offerings

original: phyir gzhan slob dpon bzhi rnams kyis //
analyzed: phyir gzhan slob dpon bzhi rnams kyis //
translated: should draw the four masters,

original: de bzhin thab tu 'dab gsum gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin thab tu 'dab gsum gyis //
translated: and likewise, in the hearth, with three petals.🔽Afterwards, the twelve seed syllables

original: phyi nas sa bon bcu gnyis dang // de bzhin 'khor lo bcu gnyis la //
analyzed: phyi nas sa bon bcu gnyis dang // de bzhin 'khor lo bcu gnyis la //
translated: and likewise the twelve wheels

original: sngags kyis bon bri bar bya //
analyzed: sngags kyis bon bri bar bya //
translated: should be drawn with the seed syllables of the mantra.

original: gro gsod bcu drug nyid la'ang //
analyzed: gro gsod bcu drug nyid la'ang //
translated: On the sixteen palm leaves,

original: ming med kyi ni khrag nyid la //🔽sen rtsi yis ni bsres pas sam //
analyzed: ming med kyi ni khrag nyid la // sen rtsi yis ni bsres pas sam //
translated: The blood of the nameless one🔽mixed with nail polish

original: yang na rgya skyegs khu bas so //🔽ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
analyzed: yang na rgya skyegs khu bas so // ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
translated: or with lac juice.🔽Yama raja sadomeya

original: ya me do ru na yo da ya /🔽ya da yo ni r'a yakshe ya /
analyzed: ya me do ru na yo da ya / ya da yo ni r'a yakshe ya /
translated: Yama medura unaya daya🔽Yama daya unira yaksheya

original: yakshe ya tsa ni r'a ma ya /
analyzed: yakshe ya tsa ni r'a ma ya /
translated: Yaksheya cana nira maya

original: lha mo gsang sngags rnyed dka' 'di; ;bdag gis ngo mchog par bshad //
analyzed: lha mo gsang sngags rnyed dka' 'di; ;bdag gis ngo mchog par bshad //
translated: I have explained this mantra of the goddess, which is difficult to obtain.

original: 'di yi sngags kyi mthu stobs kyis //
analyzed: 'di yi sngags kyi mthu stobs kyis //
translated: By the power of this mantra

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub ste //
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub ste //
translated: I will accomplish buddhahood

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug 'gro //🔽gsang sngags brtson pas sbyar byas na //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug 'gro // gsang sngags brtson pas sbyar byas na //
translated: and become the lord of the three worlds.🔽If one who is diligent in mantra practice

original: sde dang bcas pa bar snang la //
analyzed: sde dang bcas pa bar snang la //
translated: joins with the army,

original: 'gro 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med //
analyzed: 'gro 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med //
translated: they will go up into the sky, there is no doubt.

original: gshin rje'i gshed dmar rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed dmar rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Some yogins of Red Yamari

original: kha cig rtag tu dam tshig brtson //🔽rigs lnga'i bsnyen @480a *//
analyzed: kha cig rtag tu dam tshig brtson // rigs lnga'i bsnyen @480a *//
translated: always strive in the commitments.🔽Even those who have become familiar

original: par gyur pa yang //
analyzed: par gyur pa yang //
translated: with the five families

original: 'bum du bzlas pas bri bar bya //
analyzed: 'bum du bzlas pas bri bar bya //
translated: should recite it a hundred thousand times.

original: pho nyas shar gyi dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: pho nyas shar gyi dkyil 'khor du //
translated: The messenger in the eastern mandala

original: kham phor gnyis kyi dbus su mar dang sbrang rtsis yang dag par gang ba la bzhag nas zho'i zan dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / lan tshva'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: kham phor gnyis kyi dbus su mar dang sbrang rtsis yang dag par gang ba la bzhag nas zho'i zan dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / lan tshva'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: Having placed it in the middle of two bowls filled with ghee and honey, one should offer oblations of rice milk, white mustard seeds, and salt.

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la de dang mtshungs pa'i kham phor la me tog dmar po dang / sen rtsi dang rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bsres pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: nub kyi 'dab ma la de dang mtshungs pa'i kham phor la me tog dmar po dang / sen rtsi dang rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bsres pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: On the western petal, in a similar bowl, one should offer oblations of red flowers, lac dye, and madder.

original: byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sbrang chen gyis gang ba'i kham phor la yang dag par bzhag nas thab khung gru gsum du shing si ttha ka shu dang / shing sam ko tso dang / shing kandi ka dang / dug dang / ske tshe rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sbrang chen gyis gang ba'i kham phor la yang dag par bzhag nas thab khung gru gsum du shing si ttha ka shu dang / shing sam ko tso dang / shing kandi ka dang / dug dang / ske tshe rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: On the northern petal, having placed it in a bowl filled with honey, one should offer oblations in a triangular hearth of sithaka wood, samkuc wood, and kanda wood, as well as poison and black mustard seeds.

original: dgu yi bdag nyid can 'bad pas //
analyzed: dgu yi bdag nyid can 'bad pas //
translated: One should make nine oblations with effort.

original: dang por dam tshig byas nas ni //
analyzed: dang por dam tshig byas nas ni //
translated: First, having made the commitment,

original: rgyan lnga yis ni brgyan pa yis //
analyzed: rgyan lnga yis ni brgyan pa yis //
translated: adorned with the five ornaments,

original: rnal 'byor ma yang de dang mtshungs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yang de dang mtshungs //
translated: the yoginī is also similar to that.

original: sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin brgyan //
analyzed: sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin brgyan //
translated: Adorned with various precious substances.

original: rnga yab dkar pos brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: rnga yab dkar pos brgyan pa yi //

original: lag pa dag gis rdor dril yang //

original: nas kyi phye ma dang / ba lang gi gcin dang / sra rtsi pog gal te sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis dril phyis las lus thams cad bzang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nas kyi phye ma dang / ba lang gi gcin dang / sra rtsi pog gal te sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis dril phyis las lus thams cad bzang por 'gyur ro //
translated: The paste of barley flour, cow’s urine, and camphor, if applied as a massage with honey and butter, will make the whole body beautiful.

original: zla mtshan gyi dus su phag gnon pa'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcing ba las sbrum mar @483a *//
analyzed: zla mtshan gyi dus su phag gnon pa'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcing ba las sbrum mar @483a *//
translated: At the time of menstruation, the root of the plant that suppresses pigs, tied to the ear, will make one pregnant.

original: 'gyur ro // ka lamb'i p'a kam bza' bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // ka lamb'i p'a kam bza' bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
translated: One should drink the juice of the kalamba fruit; semen increases.

original: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / li khri dang / zho zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / li khri dang / zho zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
translated: By eating the powder of emblic myrobalan, lac, and curd, semen increases.

original: khu ba dang khrag zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
analyzed: khu ba dang khrag zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
translated: By eating semen and blood, semen increases.

original: bud med kyi bshad pa dang / bud med kyi gci ba sbags nas btung bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
analyzed: bud med kyi bshad pa dang / bud med kyi gci ba sbags nas btung bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
translated: By drinking the urine of a woman who has been defiled by a man, semen increases.

original: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / chu dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams brdod pa'i dus su bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / chu dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams brdod pa'i dus su bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One should eat the powder of emblic myrobalan, water, ghee, and honey mixed together.

original: mig la stugs pa dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do //
analyzed: mig la stugs pa dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do //
translated: It is good for the eyes and produces wisdom.

original: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / 'o ma la sogs pa bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / 'o ma la sogs pa bza' bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat the powder of emblic myrobalan, milk, and so forth.

original: lo'i sbyor bas tshe brgya'o //
analyzed: lo'i sbyor bas tshe brgya'o //
translated: By the yoga of the year, there is a life of one hundred years.

original: skyu ru ra'i khu bsrang gcig dang / w'a gu ts'a phye ma zho gcig btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i khu bsrang gcig dang / w'a gu ts'a phye ma zho gcig btung bar bya'o //
translated: One should drink one prastha of the juice of emblic myrobalan and one prastha of the powder of vāgujī.

original: 'khogs pa la tho rangs zla ba gcig tu zos na lo lnga brgya'i tshe ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khogs pa la tho rangs zla ba gcig tu zos na lo lnga brgya'i tshe ru 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats it in the morning for one month when one is old, one will have the life of a five-hundred-year-old.

original: w'a gu ts'i zho gcig dang / dar ba dang / chu dang phabs dang / 'o mas kyang rung ste 'thungs na zla ba drug gis lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan no //
analyzed: w'a gu ts'i zho gcig dang / dar ba dang / chu dang phabs dang / 'o mas kyang rung ste 'thungs na zla ba drug gis lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan no //
translated: One should drink a mixture of vāgujī seeds, milk, water, yeast, and curd. In six months one will have the vigor of youth.

original: mundi ri phye ma dang mar bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: mundi ri phye ma dang mar bza' bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat the powder of munidrī and ghee.

original: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lo bcu drug tu byed do //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lo bcu drug tu byed do //
translated: In twenty-one days one will look sixteen years old.

original: sha na'i sa bon gyi phye ma srang gcig dang / s'a lu dmar po srang gcig dang / ba kha dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham phor gnyis bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sha na'i sa bon gyi phye ma srang gcig dang / s'a lu dmar po srang gcig dang / ba kha dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham phor gnyis bza' bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat one pala of śanaiḥ seed powder, one pala of red rice, and two bowls of milk from a single-colored cow.

original: thog mar 'o ma kham phor gcig zad par 'thungs nas sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: thog mar 'o ma kham phor gcig zad par 'thungs nas sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btung bar bya'o //
translated: First one should drink one bowl of milk until it is finished, and then one should drink the śanaiḥ, etc.

original: de nas bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bza' bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should eat it.

original: 'khogs pa 'o mas btung bar @483b bya ste; nyi ma bdun nam gsum gyi bar du ji srid bar rlung dang tshad pa spang ngo //
analyzed: 'khogs pa 'o mas btung bar @483b bya ste; nyi ma bdun nam gsum gyi bar du ji srid bar rlung dang tshad pa spang ngo //
translated: One should drink the remaining milk with ghee. For seven or three days, one should avoid wind and heat.

original: bya ba ji lta bu dang / bya ba phyi ma ji lta bus de'i skra la sogs pa ltung bar byed do //
analyzed: bya ba ji lta bu dang / bya ba phyi ma ji lta bus de'i skra la sogs pa ltung bar byed do //
translated: What kind of action? What kind of subsequent action?

original: de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs te lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho par byed do //
analyzed: de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs te lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho par byed do //
translated: Then, having abandoned gray hair and wrinkles, one will live for five hundred years.

original: khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi byi la'i rkang pa tsam bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi byi la'i rkang pa tsam bza' bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat the root of blood-dispelling, ghee, and honey the size of a cat’s paw.🔽The result is just as before.

original: 'bras bu ni ji lta ba bzhin kho na'o; ;skyu ru ra dang / aa ru ra dang / bung ba'i rgyal po dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang / sha kar dag gis au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad kyis ril bur bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni ji lta ba bzhin kho na'o; ;skyu ru ra dang / aa ru ra dang / bung ba'i rgyal po dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang / sha kar dag gis au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad kyis ril bur bya'o //
translated: One should make pills the size of udumbara fruits with āmalaka, haritaki, bibhitaka, pippali, dried ginger, and iron filings, with honey and sugar.

original: de nas ril bu bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas ril bu bza' bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should eat the pills.

original: zla bas tshe lo sum cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla bas tshe lo sum cur 'gyur ro //
translated: One will live for thirty years.

original: ku m'a ri srang gcig dang / mar dang / zho dang ldan pas bza' bar bya ste stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ku m'a ri srang gcig dang / mar dang / zho dang ldan pas bza' bar bya ste stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: One should eat one pala of kumārī with ghee and curd; one will become very strong.

original: bha tr'a l'i dang / li ga dur sum 'gyur gyi aa ru ra dang / chu cha gcig la sogs pa zos pas stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bha tr'a l'i dang / li ga dur sum 'gyur gyi aa ru ra dang / chu cha gcig la sogs pa zos pas stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: One should eat one part of the decoction of bhringa, bhringaraja, and bala, one part of the decoction of the three myrobalan fruits, and one part of the decoction of the three spices, together with ghee and sugar.

original: thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One should eat all of this in the form of the deity.

original: sngags kyis mnyes shing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyis mnyes shing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: One should please and bless it with mantra.

original: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
translated: This is the fifth chapter on the prevention of semen loss.

original: de nas dan da'i shing gi rtsa ba phabs kyis btags nas mgo la mnye bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dan da'i shing gi rtsa ba phabs kyis btags nas mgo la mnye bar bya ste /
translated: Then, one should mix the root of the danda tree with yeast and apply it to the head.

original: mgo bo'i gzer 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: mgo bo'i gzer 'joms par byed do //
translated: It destroys headaches.

original: sbrang dang mar dang mig sman du bya ste /
analyzed: sbrang dang mar dang mig sman du bya ste /
translated: One should make an ointment with honey, ghee, and eye medicine.

original: mtshan mo long ba 'joms so //
analyzed: mtshan mo long ba 'joms so //
translated: It destroys blindness at night.

original: shing se pha la'i 'bras @484a *//
analyzed: shing se pha la'i 'bras @484a *//

original: bu'i rtsa ba zos pa las sba ba 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: bu'i rtsa ba zos pa las sba ba 'joms par byed do //
translated: It destroys hemorrhoids.

original: la phug gi sa bon dang / bri yang ku dang / tsandan dmar po dang / ru rta btags nas dril phyis byas pa las spre'u la sogs pa rnam par 'joms so //
analyzed: la phug gi sa bon dang / bri yang ku dang / tsandan dmar po dang / ru rta btags nas dril phyis byas pa las spre'u la sogs pa rnam par 'joms so //
translated: One should make a paste with the seeds of the radish, briyanku, red sandalwood, and spikenard, and apply it. It destroys monkeys and so forth.

original: sha ba'i sha skam po dang ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya ste /
analyzed: sha ba'i sha skam po dang ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat dried venison and drink goat’s milk.

original: gza' rnams 'joms so //
analyzed: gza' rnams 'joms so //
translated: [This] conquers the grahas.

original: skyu ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / tsi tra ka dang / sge'u gsher dang / bu ram rnying pa dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi mnyam par bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: skyu ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / tsi tra ka dang / sge'u gsher dang / bu ram rnying pa dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi mnyam par bza' bar bya ste /

analyzed: lan tshva dang lhan cig tu btung bar bya'o //

original: de'i khrag sri ba rnam par 'joms so //
analyzed: de'i khrag sri ba rnam par 'joms so //

analyzed: li khar dang / ya bakshar mnyam par bza' bar bya'o //

analyzed: so bh'anydza na bskol ba btung bar bya ba'am / yang na rdo 'joms pa btung bar bya ba'o //

analyzed: aa ru ra dang / tsi tra ka'i chu btung bar bya ste /

original: mchin pa'i nad 'joms so //
analyzed: mchin pa'i nad 'joms so //

original: zi ra nag po dang bu ram bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: zi ra nag po dang bu ram bza' bar bya ste /

original: rims 'khor ma 'joms so //
analyzed: rims 'khor ma 'joms so //

original: ya baksha ra'am zho btung bar bya ste /
analyzed: ya baksha ra'am zho btung bar bya ste /

original: rlung nad rnam par 'joms so //
analyzed: rlung nad rnam par 'joms so //

analyzed: rngo 'joms so //

analyzed: bu ram dang tsha ba'i til mar btung bar bya ste /

analyzed: dbugs mi bde ba rnam par 'joms so; ;aardzun dang / shing tsha dang / mar la sogs pa rnams bza' bar bya ste /

analyzed: snying gi zug rdu 'joms so //

analyzed: bil ba bsregs nas bu ram bza' bar bya ste /

analyzed: khrag tshad 'joms so; ;bu ram dang mar bza' bar bya ste /

analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang mdze la sogs pa rnams 'joms par byed do //

analyzed: bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste /

original: nad thams cad 'joms so //
analyzed: nad thams cad 'joms so //
translated: This will destroy all diseases.🔽 One should drink a powder of the three fruits, ghee, and honey.🔽This will destroy all diseases.🔽 One should drink a powder of the three fruits, ghee, and honey.🔽This will destroy all diseases.

original: aa ru ra'i phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dus gsum kun tu bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: aa ru ra'i phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dus gsum kun tu bza' bar bya ste /

original: rlung dang bad kan rnam par 'joms so //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan rnam par 'joms so //
translated: This will destroy all diseases.🔽 One should drink a powder of the three fruits, ghee, and honey.

original: ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang / shu dag dang / tshangs ma'i shing dang / pi pi ling skam pa phye mar byas nas rgyam tshva dang sbrang rtsi yis wa di ru byas te de nas bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang / shu dag dang / tshangs ma'i shing dang / pi pi ling skam pa phye mar byas nas rgyam tshva dang sbrang rtsi yis wa di ru byas te de nas bza' bar bya'o //
translated: The five parts of the baśaka plant, śigru, the wood of brāhmī, and dry pippalī should be made into a powder. Then, with rock salt and honey, it should be made into a pill. Then, it should be consumed.

original: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang bad kan 'joms so //
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang bad kan 'joms so //
translated: It conquers untimely wind and phlegm.

original: sh'alm'a li dkar po'i shing shun phye mar  byas nas padma'i sa bon dang / ku mu ta'i 'bras bu lhan cig tu byas btags te /
analyzed: sh'alm'a li dkar po'i shing shun phye mar  byas nas padma'i sa bon dang / ku mu ta'i 'bras bu lhan cig tu byas btags te /
translated: The bark of white śālmali should be made into a powder, and lotus seeds and night-blooming lotus fruit should be made together into a paste.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags @485a *//
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags @485a *//
translated: The root mantra🔽should be recited one thousand times.

original: stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas du'i ril bu'i tshad kyi ril bu rnam par byas te /
analyzed: stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas du'i ril bu'i tshad kyi ril bu rnam par byas te /

original: grib bskams byas nas tsa na ya'i khu bas bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: grib bskams byas nas tsa na ya'i khu bas bskam par bya'o //
translated: Dry them in the shade and dry them with the juice of the cāṇā plant.

original: tho rangs zos nas ji srid 'dod par btung bar bya ste /
analyzed: tho rangs zos nas ji srid 'dod par btung bar bya ste /
translated: Having eaten them in the morning, drink as much as desired.

original: gcin nad med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcin nad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Bladder disease will be eliminated.

original: dbyangs snyan par byed do //
analyzed: dbyangs snyan par byed do //
translated: One will have a melodious voice.

original: tshangs ma'i shing dang / shu dag dang / sga skya dang / pi pi ling dang / aa ru ra dang / ba sha ka dang / seng ldeng rnams sbrang rtsis ril bur byas nas bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: tshangs ma'i shing dang / shu dag dang / sga skya dang / pi pi ling dang / aa ru ra dang / ba sha ka dang / seng ldeng rnams sbrang rtsis ril bur byas nas bza' bar bya ste /
translated: The fruits of the banyan tree, of the śirīṣa tree, of the śatāvarī, of the white mustard, of the long pepper, of the yellow myrobalan, of the bael, and of the khadira tree, made into pills with honey, should be eaten.

original: 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni //
translated: The fruits are

original: de kho na bzhin no //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin no //
translated: just the same.

original: gshin rje mo dang / aa ru ra dang / sga skya dang / rgyam tsha dang / m'an s'a man rnams bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gshin rje mo dang / aa ru ra dang / sga skya dang / rgyam tsha dang / m'an s'a man rnams bza' bar bya ste /
translated: One should eat the fruits of the śigru, of the yellow myrobalan, of the white mustard, of the black pepper, and of the māṃsī.

original: 'khogs pa thams cad 'joms so //
analyzed: 'khogs pa thams cad 'joms so //
translated: It destroys all old age.

original: sle tres kyi khu ba dang sbrang rtsi btung bar byas te gcin nad 'joms so //
analyzed: sle tres kyi khu ba dang sbrang rtsi btung bar byas te gcin nad 'joms so //
translated: One should drink the juice of the long pepper and honey. It destroys urinary diseases.

original: m'a tra la 'o ma dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste /
analyzed: m'a tra la 'o ma dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste /
translated: One should drink the milk of the madhuka tree, the powder of the long pepper, ghee, and honey.

original: rims phra mo dang lud pa la sogs pa rnam par 'joms par byed do; ;ngo tsha can dang / a'a shar dang / dum kha ya dag gi rtsa ba la w'a shi'i chus btags nas rab tu byug par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i bha gar bcug nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa ji srid du de 'dzag par byed kyi bar du bskyod par bye'o // ga bur dang / @488a *//
translated: and insert it into her bhaga, you should move it as far as the channel of Vajradhātvīśvarī until she drips.🔽If you anoint with camphor,

original: dngul chu dang / tsha la dang / shing ha ti dang / pi pi ling dang / sbrang rtsi rnams kyis byugs na bud med 'dzag par byed do //
analyzed: dngul chu dang / tsha la dang / shing ha ti dang / pi pi ling dang / sbrang rtsi rnams kyis byugs na bud med 'dzag par byed do //
translated: mercury, sugar, haṭha wood, long pepper, and honey, the woman will drip.

original: shing rdza ya sti'i rtsa bas btags nas 'bras thug po che dang / chu bsres pa'i zla mtshan gyi dbus su de'i skye gnas la rab tu byugs na bud med mo sham du 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
analyzed: shing rdza ya sti'i rtsa bas btags nas 'bras thug po che dang / chu bsres pa'i zla mtshan gyi dbus su de'i skye gnas la rab tu byugs na bud med mo sham du 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
translated: If one anoints the vagina with a paste of the root of the Indian valerian, with a mixture of rice and water, and with menstrual blood, there is no doubt that a barren woman will become pregnant.

original: p'a la sha'i sa bon btags nas byug par bya zhing /
analyzed: p'a la sha'i sa bon btags nas byug par bya zhing /
translated: One should anoint with a paste of the seeds of the palasha tree,

original: mar dang sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa las khrag gi mtshan ma'i bud med mo sham du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mar dang sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa las khrag gi mtshan ma'i bud med mo sham du 'gyur ro //
translated: and drink ghee and honey. A woman with a blood disorder will become pregnant.

original: chag pa dang / phye ma leb kyi phye ma dang / phyis sa skye gnas su byin na dam por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chag pa dang / phye ma leb kyi phye ma dang / phyis sa skye gnas su byin na dam por 'gyur ro //
translated: If one inserts into the vagina a compress of the powder of the Indian licorice and the Indian pennywort, it will tighten.

original: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////

original: mgrin pa bteg nas dam 'khyud cing //
analyzed: mgrin pa bteg nas dam 'khyud cing //

analyzed: lha la yang yang 'o byas nas //

analyzed: rgyal po'i dngos por byas pa cig /

analyzed: 'khor los sgyur bar ji ltar 'gyur //

original: gang zhig nye bar ma zhugs pa //
analyzed: gang zhig nye bar ma zhugs pa //

analyzed: gnas shig tu ni rgyal srid 'gyur //

analyzed: kun tu 'gugs shing 'dren pa dang // mnga' bdag de bzhin der bzlas pa //

analyzed: nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis mchod nas // drug cu rtsa bzhi yongs rdzogs pa'i //

analyzed: sems ni brtan par byas nyid kyis //

analyzed: de bzhin slar yang chu zla ba //

analyzed: btang snyoms mchog tu 'gyur ba yin; ;lha ru cung zad bsam mi bya //

analyzed: bsam bya med cing bsam med gang //

analyzed: de yang 'dir ni yod ma yin //

analyzed: de 'dir bsam mi khyab par brjod //

analyzed: srid pa'i shing gi ltar ste // kha cig rgod dang brjod par gnas //

analyzed: kha cig rab tu 'jug par bya //

original: sgom pa'i nus pa sems la ni //
analyzed: sgom pa'i nus pa sems la ni //

analyzed: ji ltar dbye ba mi shes pa //

analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pas 'gyur //

analyzed: sna tshogs dngos grub rab ster byed //

analyzed: rang blo 'khor ba'i 'jig rten du //

analyzed: 'dod pas mtho ris rab tu skyes //

analyzed: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar byed //

analyzed: kha cig 'dam byugs yan lag brgyan //

analyzed: sna tshogs kha cig smin par byed //

analyzed: de phyir gnas pa'i sdug @492b bsngal dang // bde bas gnod pa med pa yin //

analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //

analyzed: ngo tsha'i bya ba rnam par spangs //

analyzed: blo gros sbyor ba las 'das pa //

analyzed: las rnams thams cad rig pa'i mchog //

analyzed: ces pa de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o ////

analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das //

analyzed: mngon par dbang bskur ming ci ltar; ;mnga' bdag bdag la de gsungs shig /

original: dga' ma dbang bskur rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: dga' ma dbang bskur rnam pa bzhi //

original: sems can 'jug byed de nyon cig /
analyzed: sems can 'jug byed de nyon cig /

analyzed: gtor bas dri ma med byed phyir //

analyzed: de dag kun kyang g-yo byed pa; ;'chi ste rdo rje skyil mo krung //

original: 'dzag med la sogs bde bas gang //
analyzed: 'dzag med la sogs bde bas gang //

original: 'di dag ji srid dri med gyur //
analyzed: 'di dag ji srid dri med gyur //

analyzed: byang chub sems ni spong byed pa // ji srid rnal 'byor bas mi bya // byang chub sems ni gtong byed pa //

analyzed: yang dag ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs //

original: bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //

analyzed: de ni 'jig rten bden par grags //

original: yang na don med da gang las //
analyzed: yang na don med da gang las //

original: bzhi pa slar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa slar yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: byis pa'i skye bo smra bar 'gyur //

original: de ni slar yang de bzhin zhes //

analyzed: bzhi pa de nyid gsum pa ru //

original: de bzhin byas par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: de bzhin byas par mi 'gyur te //

original: dang po'i yan lag las slar yang //
analyzed: dang po'i yan lag las slar yang //

original: smos pa skyen 'gyur de bzhin du //
analyzed: smos pa skyen 'gyur de bzhin du //

analyzed: byis pa rnams kyi rgyu gsum pa //

analyzed: gang yin 'bras bu bzhi pa ste //

analyzed: rgyu 'bras dbye ba med pa'i phyir //

analyzed: ae ma phyag rgya gsum sgrub la /

analyzed: rgyu ru mi 'gyur ro zhes pa; ;las rgya ye shes phyag rgya ni //

analyzed: sgom pa yongs su spangs pa las //
translated: “Abandoning the meditation,

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po nges par sgom //

original: 'dir ni dbang po gnyis sbyor bde //

original: 'dzag dang mi 'dzag mtshan nyid kyi //
analyzed: 'dzag dang mi 'dzag mtshan nyid kyi //

original: ngo bo'i kun spyod bder mi 'gyur //

original: gsum pa rgyu la ma skyes pa //

original: don dam bzhi par mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: don dam bzhi par mi 'gyur ro /

original: skar ma rgyal la brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: skar ma rgyal la brtsam par bya ste /
translated: One should begin on an auspicious day,

original: de yang mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: and one should be consecrated.

original: de la dog pa dmar zhing dkar ba thag pas 'bad pas 'thag pa'i rgyu dang spun de la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dog pa dmar zhing dkar ba thag pas 'bad pas 'thag pa'i rgyu dang spun de la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give to the weaver, who is red and white, the thread and the wages.🔽Every day, one should recite the mantra, and one should tie the cloth with a cord.

original: nyi ma so sor dam tshig bsten pas shes rab dang bcas pas btags nas ras de dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med rdul dang ldan pa'i dus su mal char sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma so sor dam tshig bsten pas shes rab dang bcas pas btags nas ras de dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med rdul dang ldan pa'i dus su mal char sbyin par bya'o //
translated: When the cloth is red and white, and the woman is in season, one should give it to her as a bedsheet.

original: nyi ma gsum gyi phyi nas ri mo mkhan dam tshig dang ldan pa mngon par bsngags te /🔽dpa' bo'i tshong gi gang smra bar byed pa de /
analyzed: nyi ma gsum gyi phyi nas ri mo mkhan dam tshig dang ldan pa mngon par bsngags te / dpa' bo'i tshong gi gang smra bar byed pa de /
translated: After three days, one should commission a painter who is bound by samaya.

original: de la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give him whatever he asks for.

original: sbrang rtsi chen pos snag tsha byas nas mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi chen pos snag tsha byas nas mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should make ink with great honey and write with a pen made of human bone.

original: ji srid 'bri bar byed pa de srid du myos byed cung zad 'thungs nas nyi ma so sor thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma dang / gsang sngags brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid 'bri bar byed pa de srid du myos byed cung zad 'thungs nas nyi ma so sor thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma dang / gsang sngags brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: As long as he is writing, he should drink a little wine and, every day, at the four periods, he should offer the sacrificial cake and recite the mantra one hundred times.

original: rigs rnams kyi dam tshig gi gcig tu gdon mi za bar bya'o //
analyzed: rigs rnams kyi dam tshig gi gcig tu gdon mi za bar bya'o //
translated: He should always observe the rules of the clan.

original: dpa' bo'i rim pas shin tu gsang la rab tu gnas pa yang ngo zhes so //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rim pas shin tu gsang la rab tu gnas pa yang ngo zhes so //
translated: He should be very secret and well-established in the stage of the hero.🔽The yogin of Yamantaka, who is endowed with the commitments, should write on birch bark a book twelve finger-widths long.

original: de'ang gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang ldan pas gro ga la glegs bam sor bcu gnyis pa bya'o zhes so; ;zhes pa bris sku dang glegs bam gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: de'ang gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang ldan pas gro ga la glegs bam sor bcu gnyis pa bya'o zhes so; ;zhes pa bris sku dang glegs bam gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This was the eleventh chapter on the rites of the painted image and the book, from “The Tantra of the Dialogue with Subahu.”

original: mnga' bdag rlung sbyor bdag la gsungs //
analyzed: mnga' bdag rlung sbyor bdag la gsungs //
translated: The Lord of Yogis said to the Lord of Yogis, “Please teach me the method of the wind yoga.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: @494a *// snying gar srog dang thur sel bshang //
analyzed: @494a *// snying gar srog dang thur sel bshang //
translated: “Life and downward-voiding winds are at the heart,

original: lte ba'i phyogs su mnyam gnas so //
analyzed: lte ba'i phyogs su mnyam gnas so //
translated: the fire-coinciding wind is at the navel,

original: mgrin pa'i phyogs ni gyen rgyu ste //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i phyogs ni gyen rgyu ste //
translated: the upward-moving wind is at the throat,🔽and the pervading wind is at the crown.

original: lus kun son pa khyab byed do //
analyzed: lus kun son pa khyab byed do //
translated: Pervading all the body, it is the pervader.

original: 'di rnams dbus su gtso bo gang //
analyzed: 'di rnams dbus su gtso bo gang //
translated: Which is the principal one among these?

original: srog rlung snying gar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: srog rlung snying gar gnas pa'o //
translated: The life-force wind abides at the heart.

original: dbugs dbyung dbugs rdub dbye ba yis //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung dbugs rdub dbye ba yis //
translated: Exhalation and inhalation are divided

original: 'tsho ba 'pho ba bcu drug go //
analyzed: 'tsho ba 'pho ba bcu drug go //

original: sbyor bas so so re re la //
analyzed: sbyor bas so so re re la //
translated: Through union, each of these🔽has four maṇḍalas.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi ste re re la //🔽dbyug gu re re 'bab pa yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi ste re re la // dbyug gu re re 'bab pa yis //
translated: Each of these

original: nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug go //
analyzed: nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug go //
translated: has sixteen thousand.

original: g-yas nas reg cing 'bab pa yis //
analyzed: g-yas nas reg cing 'bab pa yis //
translated: The one that flows, touching the right

original: me yi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste //
analyzed: me yi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste //
translated: is said to be the fire maṇḍala.

original: g-yon dang g-yas la reg pa las //
analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas la reg pa las //
translated: From the contact with the left and right,

original: dbang chen gyi ni 'khor lor 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang chen gyi ni 'khor lor 'gyur //
translated: the maṇḍala of the great lord arises.

original: brtan thob dal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
analyzed: brtan thob dal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
translated: The maṇḍala of the slow, stable one arises.🔽The lalanā and rasanā

original: rkyang ma dang ni ro ma dang // g-yon dang g-yas su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rkyang ma dang ni ro ma dang // g-yon dang g-yas su gnas pa'o //
translated: are located on the left and right.

original: kun 'dar ma ni dbus phyogs su //
analyzed: kun 'dar ma ni dbus phyogs su //
translated: The avadhūti is in the center.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rjes su byed //🔽'jug par 'gyur dang 'byin pa dang // gnas pa g-yo med ngo bo la //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rjes su byed // 'jug par 'gyur dang 'byin pa dang // gnas pa g-yo med ngo bo la //
translated: It follows the connate [union].🔽The one called “total victory” is the thread wind,🔽which is the nature of the movement,

original: rnam 'joms zhes pa srad bu'i rlung //
analyzed: rnam 'joms zhes pa srad bu'i rlung //
translated: the exhalation, the inhalation, and the stable abiding.

original: ji srid 'tsho ba'i 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho ba'i 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: One will enter the state of immortality.

original: 'jug pa bum pa can zhes bya //🔽da yi 'dzin las gang ba can //
analyzed: 'jug pa bum pa can zhes bya // da yi 'dzin las gang ba can //
translated: The entry is called the “vase-breathing.”🔽From the retention, there is the “full.”

original: dbyung ba re tsa ka shes bya //🔽g-yo med bum pa can du 'gyur //
analyzed: dbyung ba re tsa ka shes bya // g-yo med bum pa can du 'gyur //
translated: The exhalation is known as the “recaka.”🔽The vase-breathing is without movement.

original: rlung ni rab tu 'jug pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: rlung ni rab tu 'jug pa'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of the winds

original: stong phrag brgya la sogs pa'i grangs //
analyzed: stong phrag brgya la sogs pa'i grangs //
translated: In the hundreds of thousands and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas mgon po'i gsung ji bzhin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mgon po'i gsung ji bzhin //
translated: Just as taught by the Buddha, the protector,

original: skad cig de las 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig de las 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Will be accomplished in that instant.

original: rlung tshogs gcig gyur @494b gang yin ni //
analyzed: rlung tshogs gcig gyur @494b gang yin ni //
translated: The single assembly of the winds

original: shes rab la ni dam 'khyud pas //
analyzed: shes rab la ni dam 'khyud pas //
translated: Is the embrace of wisdom.

original: zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: It will be accomplished in half a month.

original: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
analyzed: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
translated: By the union with one’s special deity,

original: sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag ldan //
translated: One will possess the wisdom of the Buddha

original: mngon shes lnga ni shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga ni shes par 'gyur //
translated: And will know the five superknowledges.

original: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
analyzed: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
translated: By the union with one’s special deity,

original: rang gi bud med dam du 'khyud //
analyzed: rang gi bud med dam du 'khyud //
translated: One’s own woman is embraced.

original: snying ga yis ni snying ga ru //
analyzed: snying ga yis ni snying ga ru //
translated: The heart is united with the heart,

original: gsang bar gsang bas yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: gsang bar gsang bas yang dag sbyor //

original: kha yis kyang ni khar byas nas; ;byed pa med pa lhur len pas //
analyzed: kha yis kyang ni khar byas nas; ;byed pa med pa lhur len pas //
translated: one should practice without activity.

original: snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon bzhi //
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon bzhi //
translated: The four seed syllables located in the heart

original: kun tu gang bar bsgom par bya //
analyzed: kun tu gang bar bsgom par bya //
translated: should be contemplated as completely filling

original: de gnas gang yin de nyid kyis //
analyzed: de gnas gang yin de nyid kyis //
translated: whatever place they are in.

original: mi ni thams cad shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi ni thams cad shes par 'gyur //
translated: By that very thing, a person will know all.

original: kun du dgongs pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: kun du dgongs pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely contemplating all,

original: byung dang 'byung 'gyur dang da lta bar //
analyzed: byung dang 'byung 'gyur dang da lta bar //
translated: one will know the past, future, and present,

original: pha rol sems kyang shes par byed //
analyzed: pha rol sems kyang shes par byed //
translated: and also the mind of others.

original: bden pa bden par smra bar byed //
analyzed: bden pa bden par smra bar byed //

original: de bzhin sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
translated: In the same way, by that very application,

analyzed: rna ba la ni rnam bsgom bya // drung na gnas pa'i sgra ji bzhin //

analyzed: bstan pa kun ni nyan par byed //
translated: as if the sounds were right in front.

original: de bzhin mig la rab bsgoms nas //
analyzed: de bzhin mig la rab bsgoms nas //

original: 'jig rten gsum yang lta bar byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum yang lta bar byed //
translated: one will see the three worlds.

original: sna la de bzhin bsams nas ni //
analyzed: sna la de bzhin bsams nas ni //

original: dri rnams thams cad shes par byed //
analyzed: dri rnams thams cad shes par byed //

original: lce la de bzhin bsams nas ni //
analyzed: lce la de bzhin bsams nas ni //

original: thag rings myong bya rab rtogs byed //
analyzed: thag rings myong bya rab rtogs byed //

original: rang gi rtags rtser de bzhin bsam //
analyzed: rang gi rtags rtser de bzhin bsam //

original: reg bya thams cad shes par byed //
analyzed: reg bya thams cad shes par byed //

original: de bzhin mgo bo'i dbus bsams nas //
analyzed: de bzhin mgo bo'i dbus bsams nas //
translated: In the same way, having contemplated in the middle of the head,

original: nus pa thams cad rab 'phel byed //
analyzed: nus pa thams cad rab 'phel byed //
translated: One should increase all abilities.

original: gang dang gang du rlung gnas pa //
analyzed: gang dang gang du rlung gnas pa //

original: ro mnyam gyur par byas pa ni //
analyzed: ro mnyam gyur par byas pa ni //
translated: Having made it of the same taste,

original: 'gags pa de dang de nyid la //
analyzed: 'gags pa de dang de nyid la //
translated: Wherever it is blocked,

original: @495a *// de nyid so sor rtogs par byed //
analyzed: @495a *// de nyid so sor rtogs par byed //
translated: One should realize it individually.

original: zhi dang rgyas pa can dang dbang //
analyzed: zhi dang rgyas pa can dang dbang //
translated: Pacification, increase, power,🔽In the same way, summoning, killing,

original: de bzhin 'gugs dang gsod pa dang / skrod par byed dang thams cad nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin 'gugs dang gsod pa dang / skrod par byed dang thams cad nyid //

original: sgom pa kho nas rab sgrub byed //
analyzed: sgom pa kho nas rab sgrub byed //

original: bum pa can sogs rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: bum pa can sogs rab sbyor bas //

original: lta stangs bzhi ni nges sbyor bya //
analyzed: lta stangs bzhi ni nges sbyor bya //

original: g-yon du'ang lta ba'i lta stangs ni //
analyzed: g-yon du'ang lta ba'i lta stangs ni //
