original: bum pa can gyis dbang du byed //
analyzed: bum pa can gyis dbang du byed //
translated: Is magnetizing through vase-breathing.🔽The gaze to the right is for summoning,

original: g-yas nas dgug par bya ba ni; ;gang ba can gyis nges par sbyor //
analyzed: g-yas nas dgug par bya ba ni; ;gang ba can gyis nges par sbyor //
translated: Definitely applied with the full vase.

original: dpral bar gnas pa'i lta stangs gang //
analyzed: dpral bar gnas pa'i lta stangs gang //
translated: The gaze located in the forehead

original: re tsa ka yis gsod par byed //
analyzed: re tsa ka yis gsod par byed //
translated: Kills with the rat-killer.

original: sna rtser gnas pa'i lta stangs ni //
analyzed: sna rtser gnas pa'i lta stangs ni //
translated: The gaze located at the tip of the nose🔽paralyzes with the vase-breathing.

original: bum pa can gyis rengs par byed; ;dza ba'i me tog bum pa can //
analyzed: bum pa can gyis rengs par byed; ;dza ba'i me tog bum pa can //
translated: The vase-breathing with the jasmine flower

original: rlon pa'i shing la re tsa kas //
analyzed: rlon pa'i shing la re tsa kas //
translated: with the recaka on the moist wood

original: mnyam par zos la re tsa kas //
analyzed: mnyam par zos la re tsa kas //
translated: with the recaka on the even-tasting

original: g-yo bcas rtsa la bum pa can //
analyzed: g-yo bcas rtsa la bum pa can //
translated: with the vase-breathing on the moving channel

original: sngon du lta stangs nges sbyor ba //
analyzed: sngon du lta stangs nges sbyor ba //
translated: is applied beforehand to the gaze.

original: zla ba drug tu bsam par bya //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu bsam par bya //
translated: One should contemplate for six months.

original: kun gyi nus pa sbyor ba ni //
analyzed: kun gyi nus pa sbyor ba ni //
translated: The application of the power of all

original: sems 'gog pa las 'grub par byed //🔽sems 'gog pa las rlung 'gog ste //
analyzed: sems 'gog pa las 'grub par byed // sems 'gog pa las rlung 'gog ste //
translated: is accomplished from the cessation of the mind.🔽From the cessation of the mind, the wind ceases;

original: 'gog las sems kyang 'gog par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gog las sems kyang 'gog par 'gyur //
translated: from the cessation, the mind also ceases.

original: phan tshun son pa bcings pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun son pa bcings pa'o //
translated: They are bound by mutual movement.🔽In the realization of the vajra and lotus

original: shes rab thabs gcig rdo rje dang // padma mnyam par rtogs pa la //
analyzed: shes rab thabs gcig rdo rje dang // padma mnyam par rtogs pa la //
translated: as one in wisdom and method,

original: 'gog pa'i bde ba zos pa ni //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bde ba zos pa ni //
translated: the bliss of cessation is enjoyed.

original: thams cad yang dag 'grub par 'dod //
analyzed: thams cad yang dag 'grub par 'dod //
translated: It is held that everything is perfectly accomplished.🔽Brahma, Vishnu, and so forth,

original: tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs lha //
analyzed: tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs lha //
translated: all the worldly ones

original: sngags pa de yi lhan cig tu //🔽'jig rten ba kun ci slar yang //
analyzed: sngags pa de yi lhan cig tu // 'jig rten ba kun ci slar yang //
translated: are present together with that mantra practitioner

original: ci bgyi yod par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ci bgyi yod par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: and become whatever is needed.

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud du //
translated: In the Yoga and Yoginī Tantra

original: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa @495b yang //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa @495b yang //
translated: the Omniscient One has taught

original: rtsod ldan dus su rab tu spyod //
analyzed: rtsod ldan dus su rab tu spyod //
translated: the practice in the age of strife.

original: dngos grub med par mi blta ste //
analyzed: dngos grub med par mi blta ste //
translated: One should not see it as lacking power,🔽for in the perfect age, the triple age, the double age,

original: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang // rtsod dus la yang bden par 'grub //🔽slar yang lha dang bcas pa yi //
analyzed: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang // rtsod dus la yang bden par 'grub // slar yang lha dang bcas pa yi //
translated: and the age of strife, it is established as true.🔽Again, the supreme power

original: dngos grub mchog ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni bstan par bya //
translated: of the gods and so forth is taught.

original: spas pa kun mkhyen spyod yul ba //
analyzed: spas pa kun mkhyen spyod yul ba //
translated: The domain of the omniscient one is profound,

original: khyod kyis de la nga yis bshad //
analyzed: khyod kyis de la nga yis bshad //
translated: and I have explained it to you.

original: gshin rje'i gshed pos de'i ngal ba 'bras bu med //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed pos de'i ngal ba 'bras bu med //
translated: Yama-Slayer, your toil is fruitless.

original: ces so // gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du rlung gi de nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////🔽bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed kyi mi //
analyzed: ces so // gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du rlung gi de nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //// bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed kyi mi //
translated: This is the twelfth chapter, called the “Reality of the Winds,” from the Red Yamari Tantra.

original: dmar po brjod pa'i ming can la //
analyzed: dmar po brjod pa'i ming can la //
translated: The name of the red🔽Bhagawan Yama-Slayer

original: ya yig gis ni ci zhig brjod //
analyzed: ya yig gis ni ci zhig brjod //
translated: is expressed by the syllable ya.

original: de bzhin ma yig gis kyang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin ma yig gis kyang ni //
translated: Likewise, by the syllable ma

original: slar yang de yi aa yig gis //
analyzed: slar yang de yi aa yig gis //
translated: is expressed the syllable a of that,

original: ri yig gis ci brjod par bya //
analyzed: ri yig gis ci brjod par bya //
translated: and by the syllable ri, what is to be expressed?

original: rakta nyid ni ci yi ming //
analyzed: rakta nyid ni ci yi ming //
translated: What is the name of rakta?

original: mnga' bdag bden pas gsung du gsol //
analyzed: mnga' bdag bden pas gsung du gsol //
translated: Lord, please speak the truth.

original: legs so legs so gang dris pa //
analyzed: legs so legs so gang dris pa //
translated: Excellent, excellent! What was asked🔽will be explained, so listen:

original: de ni bshad kyi nyon cig dang // ya yig gis ni rlung yang ste //
analyzed: de ni bshad kyi nyon cig dang // ya yig gis ni rlung yang ste //
translated: The syllable ya is also wind,

original: gshin rje'i gshed dmar por brjod bya //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed dmar por brjod bya //
translated: and is called Red Yamari.

original: de nas ya yig mchog tu dga'//
analyzed: de nas ya yig mchog tu dga'//
translated: Then, the syllable ya is supreme joy,

original: ma yig gnyis par brjod par bya //
analyzed: ma yig gnyis par brjod par bya //
translated: and the syllable ma is said to be the second.

original: a'a ri dga' ba gsum pa'o //
analyzed: a'a ri dga' ba gsum pa'o //
translated: The syllable ā is the third joy,

original: rakta bzhi pa'i ming can ni //
analyzed: rakta bzhi pa'i ming can ni //
translated: and rakta is the fourth.

original: yang na rlung dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: yang na rlung dang ldan pa la //
translated: Alternatively, in the case of wind,

original: de yi thabs ni aa yig ste //
analyzed: de yi thabs ni aa yig ste //
translated: the method is the syllable a,

original: ae yig reg pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: ae yig reg pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: the syllable e is the organ of touch,

original: rakta gnyis med sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rakta gnyis med sbyor ba'o //
translated: and rakta is the union of nonduality.

original: mang na rakta 'dod chags rgyal //
analyzed: mang na rakta 'dod chags rgyal //
translated: If it is asked what is rakta,🔽it is the wind that is moved by the prana

original: rlung gis por  bskul dar son sems //
analyzed: rlung gis por  bskul dar son sems //
translated: and the mind that has reached maturity.

original: a'a ri stong nyid snying rje gcig /
analyzed: a'a ri stong nyid snying rje gcig /
translated: The syllable ā is the unity of emptiness and compassion,

original: rakta ya m'a ri zhes brjod //
analyzed: rakta ya m'a ri zhes brjod //
translated: and is called rakta-yamari.

original: dga' ba bzhi yi ming @496a *//
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi yi ming @496a *//
translated: The name of the four joys🔽is the fifth.

original: lnga'o; ;skad cig bzhi ru shes par bya //
analyzed: lnga'o; ;skad cig bzhi ru shes par bya //
translated: One should know the four moments.

original: de nas gti mug la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: de nas gti mug la sogs pa'i //
translated: Then, ignorance, and so on,

original: ming ni mnga' bdag khyod gsungs shig /
analyzed: ming ni mnga' bdag khyod gsungs shig /
translated: You, O Lord, should proclaim the names!

original: gti mug gshin rje mthar byed ni; ;rnam snang mdzad do phra ma yi //🔽gshin rje mthar byed rin chen 'byung //
analyzed: gti mug gshin rje mthar byed ni; ;rnam snang mdzad do phra ma yi // gshin rje mthar byed rin chen 'byung //
translated: Mohavajrāntaka is Vairocana, and Paiśunya-vajrāntaka is🔽Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽 Rāgavajrāntaka is

original: 'dod chags gshin rje mthar byed ni //🔽snang mtha' phrag dog gshin mthar byed //🔽don grub dbus su mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: 'dod chags gshin rje mthar byed ni // snang mtha' phrag dog gshin mthar byed // don grub dbus su mi bskyod pa //
translated: Amitābha, and īrṣyāvajrāntaka is🔽Amoghasiddhi.

original: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'o //
translated: In the middle is Akṣobhya, the red Yamāntaka.

original: tsa rtsi k'a sogs ngo bo ci //🔽sa khams spyan ma tsi rtsi k'a //🔽chu khams m'a ma k'i phag mo //
analyzed: tsa rtsi k'a sogs ngo bo ci // sa khams spyan ma tsi rtsi k'a // chu khams m'a ma k'i phag mo //
translated: What is the essence of Caṇḍālī and so forth?🔽 The earth element is Locanā and Caṇḍālī,

original: me khams dkar mo dbyangs can ma //🔽rlung khams sgrol ma goo r'i'o //
analyzed: me khams dkar mo dbyangs can ma // rlung khams sgrol ma goo r'i'o //
translated: the water element is Māmakī and Vārāhī,🔽the fire element is Pāṇḍaravāsinī and Sarasvatī,🔽the wind element is Tārā and Gaurī,

original: mkha' khams rdo rje ro langs ma //
analyzed: mkha' khams rdo rje ro langs ma //
translated: and the space element is Vajravetālī.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa'o //
translated: They embrace the Bhagavān.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags las //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags las //
translated: From the passion of great passion,

original: bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni /
translated: by the taste of great bliss,

original: gnyis med ngo bo dpa' bo ste //
analyzed: gnyis med ngo bo dpa' bo ste //
translated: the hero is the nondual essence,

original: bcu drug cha rdzogs zla ba bzhin //
analyzed: bcu drug cha rdzogs zla ba bzhin //
translated: like the moon full of the sixteen portions.

original: zhes pa / gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du ming mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: zhes pa / gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du ming mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
translated: Thus, the thirteenth chapter in the Tantra of Red Yamari, the one called The Teaching of the Names, is completed.

original: ro langs mas ni dam 'khyud nas //
analyzed: ro langs mas ni dam 'khyud nas //
translated: The Vetali embraces him,

original: 'o byas tshems kyis ma mchu bzung //
analyzed: 'o byas tshems kyis ma mchu bzung //
translated: and with a kiss, he takes her lower lip with his teeth.

original: sems can don phyir gtor ma che //
analyzed: sems can don phyir gtor ma che //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, the great bali

original: lha mor bcas pas de la zhus //
analyzed: lha mor bcas pas de la zhus //
translated: is requested by the goddess.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i nga rgyal byas nas steng du bla re dang rnga yab dkar po dang / phyi rol du gar dang / glus nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i nga rgyal byas nas steng du bla re dang rnga yab dkar po dang / phyi rol du gar dang / glus nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
translated: Having done the pride of glorious Red Yamari, above, with a canopy and white yak-tail fans, outside, with dancing and singing, beautified,

original: rgyan @496b thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: rgyan @496b thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
translated: adorned with all ornaments,

original: g-yon pa dang gcig shos dril bu dang rdo rje sgra dbyangs kyis yongs su gang la 'bar zhing gsal la rgyas pa'i snod kyi gtor ma dor bar bya ste snod gnyis gzhag bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa dang gcig shos dril bu dang rdo rje sgra dbyangs kyis yongs su gang la 'bar zhing gsal la rgyas pa'i snod kyi gtor ma dor bar bya ste snod gnyis gzhag bar bya'o //
translated: with the left and right hands, a bell and a vajra, filling the sound, with a vessel of bali, blazing, clear, and expansive, one should cast it out, and two vessels should be placed.

original: snod gcig tu go gu da ha na dang / bi ra shu m'a mu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i sha dang / 'o ma dang / nya shas yang dag par gang bar bya'o //
analyzed: snod gcig tu go gu da ha na dang / bi ra shu m'a mu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i sha dang / 'o ma dang / nya shas yang dag par gang bar bya'o //
translated: In one vessel, one should place the five ambrosias together with meat, milk, and fish.

original: gzhan du khyim la sogs pa'i lha rnams gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du khyim la sogs pa'i lha rnams gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In another, one should place the household deities.

original: aom hr'i: sht'i: bi kri t'a nan h'um sarba bigh'am ga n'am sa pa ri w'a r'an a'a karsha ya dza:/
analyzed: aom hr'i: sht'i: bi kri t'a nan h'um sarba bigh'am ga n'am sa pa ri w'a r'an a'a karsha ya dza:/
translated: With the mantra Oṃ hṛiḥ ṣṭṛiḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ sarva-vighneśān saparivāraṃ ākarṣaya jaḥ,

original: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis shar phyogs kyi cha ba rnams la bka' bsgo ba dang / rang nyid song nas bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyi mgrin par zhags pas bcings nas snying gar lcags kyus phug ste 'gugs bzhin par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis shar phyogs kyi cha ba rnams la bka' bsgo ba dang / rang nyid song nas bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyi mgrin par zhags pas bcings nas snying gar lcags kyus phug ste 'gugs bzhin par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should order the eastern directions, and having gone oneself, one should imagine that the hosts of obstructors are bound by the noose around the neck, pierced by the iron hook in the heart, and are being summoned.

original: dbang po ser po spyan stong ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pas srung dkar po la zhon pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po ser po spyan stong ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pas srung dkar po la zhon pa'o //
translated: Indra, yellow, with a thousand eyes, holding a thunderbolt, is mounted on an elephant.

original: lho ru gshin rje nag po lag na dbyug pa can ma he la zhon pa'o //
analyzed: lho ru gshin rje nag po lag na dbyug pa can ma he la zhon pa'o //
translated: In the south, black Yama, holding a club, is mounted on a water buffalo.

original: nub tu chu lha dkar po chu srin ma ka ra la zhon pa la na ku mud can no /
analyzed: nub tu chu lha dkar po chu srin ma ka ra la zhon pa la na ku mud can no /
translated: In the west, white Varuṇa is mounted on a makara and holds a nāgapuṣpa.

original: byang gi 'dab mar gnod sbyin ser po mi la zhon pa lag na dpal 'bras thogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi 'dab mar gnod sbyin ser po mi la zhon pa lag na dpal 'bras thogs pa'o //
translated: On the petal in the north, yellow Kubera is mounted on a human being and holds a śrīphala fruit in his hand.

original: 'di rnams thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i cod pan can //
analyzed: 'di rnams thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i cod pan can //
translated: All of them are adorned with all ornaments and have jeweled crowns.

original: gshin rje ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can no //
analyzed: gshin rje ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can no //
translated: Yama has a sun seat and sun light.

original: lhag ma rnams zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can no //
translated: The rest have moon seats and moon light.

original: dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar 'byung po'i bdag po dkar po mig gsum pa ral ba'i cod pan @497a *//
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar 'byung po'i bdag po dkar po mig gsum pa ral ba'i cod pan @497a *//
translated: On the petal in the northeast, white Īśāna has three eyes and a topknot of hair.

original: can khyu mchog la zhon pa lag na mdung thogs bstag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa lus thal bas byugs pa /
analyzed: can khyu mchog la zhon pa lag na mdung thogs bstag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa lus thal bas byugs pa /
translated: He is mounted on a bull, holds a spear in his hand, wears a cloak of elephant hide, and his body is smeared with ashes.

original: rus pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with all bone ornaments.

original: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od do //
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od do //
translated: He has a moon seat and moon light.

original: me'i 'dab ma la me lha ser po bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba ra la zhon pa bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
analyzed: me'i 'dab ma la me lha ser po bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba ra la zhon pa bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
translated: On the petal of fire is the yellow fire god, short-statured and pot-bellied, riding a goat, holding a rosary and a water pot.

original: ral pa'i cod pan can nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dpa' bo'i gos so //
analyzed: ral pa'i cod pan can nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dpa' bo'i gos so //
translated: He has a topknot and a sun seat, and he is clad in the hero’s garment of sun-light.

original: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la srin po skra grol ba can lag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
analyzed: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la srin po skra grol ba can lag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
translated: On the petal of the direction of the fallen is the rakshasa, with loose hair, holding a flaying knife and a skull-cup.

original: khros pa smin ma khro gnyer dang bcas pa nag po ro'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: khros pa smin ma khro gnyer dang bcas pa nag po ro'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
translated: He is black, wrathful, with scowling eyebrows, and has a sun seat and a sun-light aura on a corpse.

original: rlung phyogs kyi 'dab ma la rlung lha ljang zhing dmar pa lag na ba dan thogs pa /
analyzed: rlung phyogs kyi 'dab ma la rlung lha ljang zhing dmar pa lag na ba dan thogs pa /
translated: On the petal of the direction of the wind is the green wind god, holding a flag in his hand.

original: rin po che'i cod pan can; ri dvags la zhon pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can /
analyzed: rin po che'i cod pan can; ri dvags la zhon pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can /
translated: He has a jeweled crown, rides a deer, has a moon seat and a moon-light aura,

original: rgyan thams cad 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad 'dzin pa'o //
translated: and holds all ornaments.

original: ze 'bru la sa'i lha mo ser mo lha'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: ze 'bru la sa'i lha mo ser mo lha'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: On the pistil cup is the yellow earth goddess, adorned with all the garments and ornaments of a goddess.

original: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od dang yi dvags dang sa'i lhas kun nas bskor te gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od dang yi dvags dang sa'i lhas kun nas bskor te gnas pa'o //
translated: He is surrounded by the moon seat, moon light, ghosts, and earth goddesses.

original: dbang po la sogs pa rnams g-yon na klu'i zhags pa 'chang ba thams cad kyang g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa rnams g-yon na klu'i zhags pa 'chang ba thams cad kyang g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Indra and so forth hold snake lassos in their left hands. All of them stand with their left legs straight.

original: steng du chos 'byung la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad la shar gyi 'dab ma la zla ba dkar po rta la zhon pa rin po che dkar po'i cod @497b ban can zla ba'i 'od do //
analyzed: steng du chos 'byung la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad la shar gyi 'dab ma la zla ba dkar po rta la zhon pa rin po che dkar po'i cod @497b ban can zla ba'i 'od do //
translated: Above, on the source of phenomena, on an eight-petaled lotus, on the eastern petal is white Candra riding a horse, with a white jewel crown and moon light.

original: lho'i 'dab ma nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis pa padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: lho'i 'dab ma nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis pa padma 'dzin pa /
translated: On the southern petal is red Sūrya, with two hands holding a lotus,

original: rta ljang gu la zhon pa rin po che'i cod pan dang rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa 'od sngo bsams can no /
analyzed: rta ljang gu la zhon pa rin po che'i cod pan dang rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa 'od sngo bsams can no /
translated: riding a green horse, with a jewel crown and all ornaments, and blue light.

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la lhag pa ser po khyu mchog la zhon pa nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nub kyi 'dab ma la lhag pa ser po khyu mchog la zhon pa nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
translated: On the western petal is yellow Vṛṣa, riding a bull, with a sun seat and sun light, holding a trident.

original: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgra gcan mjug ring nyi ma'i gdan dang / nyi ma'i 'od can cher gnag pa dang du ba'i mdog can 'khor lo 'khor bas bkug nas za ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan dang thal mo sbyar ba 'dzin pa'i mjug rings so //
analyzed: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgra gcan mjug ring nyi ma'i gdan dang / nyi ma'i 'od can cher gnag pa dang du ba'i mdog can 'khor lo 'khor bas bkug nas za ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan dang thal mo sbyar ba 'dzin pa'i mjug rings so //
translated: On the petals of the wind maṇḍala, Rāhu is long-tailed, with a seat of the sun, and is black and smoky, with the color of the sun, holding a wheel, and in the manner of eating, Rāhu, and holding his palms together, long-tailed.

original: de'i dbus kyi ze 'bru la tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa dbyug gu gsum 'chang ba dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag can phyag lhag ma dag gis bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'chang ba ser po dang ba zhon pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla
analyzed: de'i dbus kyi ze 'bru la tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa dbyug gu gsum 'chang ba dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag can phyag lhag ma dag gis bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'chang ba ser po dang ba zhon pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla
translated: In the center of that, Brahmā has four faces and four arms, holding a club and a boon-granting hand, and the remaining hands hold a rosary and a water jar, is yellow, rides a goose, has a seat of the moon, and is the color of the moon.

original: ba'i 'od can mchod phyir thogs pa can ral pa ser po /
analyzed: ba'i 'od can mchod phyir thogs pa can ral pa ser po /
translated: He has a sacred thread, yellow hair,

original: gzugs thung ba tshangs pa'i bus bskor ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs thung ba tshangs pa'i bus bskor ba ste /
translated: and is short in form, surrounded by Brahmā’s sons.

original: tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / 'og min la sogs pa'i ming can rnams so //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / 'og min la sogs pa'i ming can rnams so //
translated: The gods of Brahmapurohita, Brahmakāyika, Brahmapārṣadya, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Avṛha, Atapa, Sudarśana, and Akaniṣṭha.

original: 'og gi chos 'byung gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la nor rgyas kyi bu ser po; klu padma dkar po /
analyzed: 'og gi chos 'byung gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la nor rgyas kyi bu ser po; klu padma dkar po /
translated: On the petal in the lower corner of the dharma source, yellow Vāsuki, white Padma,

original: klu stobs kyi rgyu dmar po /
analyzed: klu stobs kyi rgyu dmar po /
translated: red Takṣaka,

original: klu 'jog po nag po /
analyzed: klu 'jog po nag po /
translated: black Kulika,

original: klu dung skyong mi'i gdong pa can rgyan thams cad 'chang ba /
analyzed: klu dung skyong mi'i gdong pa can rgyan thams cad 'chang ba /
translated: and white Śaṅkhapāla, who has a human face and wears all the ornaments,

original: mgo bor gdengs ka dang bcas pas mtshan pa /🔽lha ma @498a *//
analyzed: mgo bor gdengs ka dang bcas pas mtshan pa / lha ma @498a *//
translated: his head marked with a hood.

original: yin dang sems can dmyal ba'i sems can dang lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: yin dang sems can dmyal ba'i sems can dang lhan cig pa'o //
translated: The asura and hell beings are together with him.

original: khre 'bru lhag ma la klu lhag ma la rin po che'i cod pan can mi'i gdong pa can no //
analyzed: khre 'bru lhag ma la klu lhag ma la rin po che'i cod pan can mi'i gdong pa can no //
translated: The remaining nāgas are on the remaining grains, wearing jeweled crowns and having human faces.

original: 'dir gdengs can 'di dag bstan par byas nas slar de dag yongs su gyur pas dpal gshin rje'i gshed mthar byed kyi gzugs kyis rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: 'dir gdengs can 'di dag bstan par byas nas slar de dag yongs su gyur pas dpal gshin rje'i gshed mthar byed kyi gzugs kyis rdzogs par byas te /
translated: Having taught these nāgas here, they transform again and are perfected in the form of glorious Yamāntaka.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rab tu sbyor ba las steng du gnas pa ni sku'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rab tu sbyor ba las steng du gnas pa ni sku'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The upper part of the body is the form of the body.

original: dbus su gnas pa ni slar yang mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su gnas pa ni slar yang mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The middle part is the form of Akshobhya.

original: 'og tu gnas pa ni gsung rdo rje rnam par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'og tu gnas pa ni gsung rdo rje rnam par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The lower part is the form of Vajra Speech.

original: las thams cad kyi don du slar yang phyag dang zhal ji lta ba de lta bu'i nga rgyal ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: las thams cad kyi don du slar yang phyag dang zhal ji lta ba de lta bu'i nga rgyal ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of all actions, one should have the pride of being just like the face and hands.

original: yang na thams cad du bdag nyid kyi gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na thams cad du bdag nyid kyi gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin no //
translated: Or else, everywhere one should be in one's own form.

original: de'i rjes su /
analyzed: de'i rjes su /
translated: After that,

original: aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: one should offer the water for the feet with the fangs mudra, saying Om argham pratichcha svaha.

original: mche ba'i phyag rgyas zhabs dag la zhabs bsil phul nas sngar brjod pa'i bdud rtsi myang bas gtor ma'i kun spyod bya'o //🔽aom rakta mu ku t'a ya /🔽rakta dza t'a ya /
analyzed: mche ba'i phyag rgyas zhabs dag la zhabs bsil phul nas sngar brjod pa'i bdud rtsi myang bas gtor ma'i kun spyod bya'o // aom rakta mu ku t'a ya / rakta dza t'a ya /
translated: One should perform the rite of the sacrificial vessel with the tasting of the nectar as previously described.🔽Om to the one with a red crown!

original: rakta mu kh'a ya /🔽rakta bhu dz'a ya /🔽rakta sha r'i r'a ya /
analyzed: rakta mu kh'a ya / rakta bhu dz'a ya / rakta sha r'i r'a ya /
translated: To the one with red hair!🔽To the one with a red face!🔽To the one with red arms!

original: rakta munta m'a l'a bha ra n'a ya /
analyzed: rakta munta m'a l'a bha ra n'a ya /
translated: To the one with red sharira!🔽To the one with a garland of red lotuses!

original: rakta padma a'a sa n'a ya rakta bha ra na bhu sha n'a ya /
analyzed: rakta padma a'a sa n'a ya rakta bha ra na bhu sha n'a ya /
translated: To the red lotus, to the one adorned with red ornaments,

original: ai mam ba lim grihna grihna tsa turmma ttme b'a r'a ya na b'a r'a ya /
analyzed: ai mam ba lim grihna grihna tsa turmma ttme b'a r'a ya na b'a r'a ya /
translated: to my bali, take, take, to the four mothers, to the one who grants boons, grant boons,

original: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /🔽tstshinda tstshinda / bhinda bhinda /
analyzed: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya / tstshinda tstshinda / bhinda bhinda /
translated: to the one who rescues, rescue,

original: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /🔽sho sha ya sho sha ya /
analyzed: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya / sho sha ya sho sha ya /
translated: to the one who cuts, cut, to the one who pierces, pierce,🔽to the one who destroys, destroy,🔽to the one who dries up, dry up,

original: tstshe ya tstshe da ya /🔽bee da bhe da /
analyzed: tstshe ya tstshe da ya / bee da bhe da /
translated: to the one who kills, kill,🔽to the one who splits, split,

original: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: hum hum phat phat svāhā.

original: aom aind'a ya hr'i: ma @498b m'a ya shtr'i: ba ru n'a ya bi /
analyzed: aom aind'a ya hr'i: ma @498b m'a ya shtr'i: ba ru n'a ya bi /
translated: Om to Indra, hrīḥ, to Māra, ṣṭrī, to Varuna, vi,

original: ku bee r'a ya kri a'i sha n'a ya t'a /
analyzed: ku bee r'a ya kri a'i sha n'a ya t'a /
translated: to Kubera, kṛ, to Īśāna, ta,

original: aagna ye aa /
analyzed: aagna ye aa /
translated: to Agni, a,

original: nee ri tya ya na /
analyzed: nee ri tya ya na /
translated: to Nirṛti, na,

original: b'a ya be na /
analyzed: b'a ya be na /
translated: to Vāyu, va,

original: tsandr'a ya h'um/ aarka ya h'um/
analyzed: tsandr'a ya h'um/ aarka ya h'um/
translated: to Candra, hūṃ, to Arka, hūṃ,

original: brahma ne phat/ ba sundha r'a yee phat/
analyzed: brahma ne phat/ ba sundha r'a yee phat/
translated: to Brahmā, phaṭ, to Vasundharā, phaṭ,

original: bee ma tsi tri ne sv'a /
analyzed: bee ma tsi tri ne sv'a /
translated: to Vīma, citrī, svā,

original: sarba bhu te bhyo h'a /
analyzed: sarba bhu te bhyo h'a /
translated: to all bhūtas, bhyo, ha.

original: h'a h'a h'a h'i h'i h'i h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: h'a h'a h'a h'i h'i h'i h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Ha ha ha hī hī hī hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ,

original: phem phem phem phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phem phem phem phat sv'a h'a /
translated: pheṃ pheṃ pheṃ phat svāhā.

original: aom mo ha ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom mo ha ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Om to the one with the illusion-like form, svāhā.

original: aom pi shu na ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom r'a ga ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pi shu na ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a / aom r'a ga ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ piśunayamāntakāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ rāgayamāntakāya svāhā.

original: aom a'irshya ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'irshya ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ aiṣayayamāntakāya svāhā.

original: aom badzra tsartsi k'a ye sv'a h'a /🔽aom badzra b'a ra hyee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra tsartsi k'a ye sv'a h'a / aom badzra b'a ra hyee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajracarcikāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ vajravarāhīye svāhā.

original: aom badzra sva ra sva tyee sv'a h'a /🔽aom badzra goo ryee sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra sva ra sva tyee sv'a h'a / aom badzra goo ryee sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajrasarasvatyai svāhā.🔽Oṃ vajragauriye svāhā.

original: aom badzra datt'a yee ba li pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra datt'a yee ba li pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajradattāyai baliṃ pratīccha svāhā.

original: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of vajra stupidity,

original: gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
translated: the very terrifying Yamāntaka,

original: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
translated: the teacher, the nature of all buddhas,

original: sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Vajrakāya, homage to you.

original: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of vajra slander,

original: gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
translated: the very terrifying Yamāntaka,🔽the clear vajra mind,

original: thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba; ;rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba; ;rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Vajraratna, homage to you.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of vajra desire,

original: mnga' bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas //
analyzed: mnga' bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas //
translated: the lord, the source of the Dharma of passion,

original: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog /
analyzed: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog /
translated: Supreme of all supreme melodies,

original: gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Speech Vajra, homage to you!

original: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You whose nature is jealousy vajra,

original: gshin rje'i gshed po las kun byed //
analyzed: gshin rje'i gshed po las kun byed //
translated: Slayer of Yama, you perform all actions.

original: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
analyzed: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
translated: You are the clear manifestation of the vajra body,

original: phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Sword in hand, homage to you!

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You are the nature of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
translated: You are all buddhas gathered into one,

original: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /
translated: Supreme of all buddhas, supreme of the supreme,

original: dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Lord of the maṇḍala, homage to you!

original: ho bha ga wan @499a *//🔽tve no pa tishtha dri tho me bha ba /🔽su to shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: ho bha ga wan @499a *// tve no pa tishtha dri tho me bha ba / su to shyo me bha ba /
translated: Ho Bhagavān!🔽Please remain here!🔽Please be pleased!🔽Please be well disposed!

original: su po shyo me bha ba /🔽aa nu rakto me bha ba /
analyzed: su po shyo me bha ba / aa nu rakto me bha ba /
translated: Please be favorably inclined!🔽Please accomplish all my goals!

original: sarba siddhi mme bra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsiitam shri ya:ku ru h'um/
analyzed: sarba siddhi mme bra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsiitam shri ya:ku ru h'um/
translated: Please make all my actions successful!🔽Please make my mind virtuous! Hūṃ!

original: ha ha ha ha ho bha ga w'a na /
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho bha ga w'a na /
translated: Ha ha ha ha! Ho Bhagavān!

original: bcom ldan 'das sku bzhi po gsung du gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sku bzhi po gsung du gsol /
translated: Please teach the four bodies of the Bhagavān.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: nyon cig bha gar 'jig rten 'das //
analyzed: nyon cig bha gar 'jig rten 'das //
translated: Listen, the transcendent state of the bhaga

original: sangs rgyas sku ni 'jig rten pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku ni 'jig rten pa //
translated: is the mundane body of the buddhas.

original: rnams la phan pa'i ched du ni //
analyzed: rnams la phan pa'i ched du ni //
translated: For the purpose of benefiting🔽all sentient beings,

original: he ru ka ngas bstan pa yin /
analyzed: he ru ka ngas bstan pa yin /
translated: I, Heruka, have taught🔽the body of the buddhas.

original: bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas dman //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas dman //
translated: Those who are inferior due to the instructions of a bad guru

original: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par spangs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par spangs //
translated: and have abandoned the body of the buddhas

original: rdo rje theg pas rnam dman pa //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pas rnam dman pa //
translated: and are inferior due to the Vajrayāna

original: de rnams rgyud 'dir kha phyir phyogs //
analyzed: de rnams rgyud 'dir kha phyir phyogs //
translated: are turned away from this tantra.

original: gang gis he yig mi shes pa //
analyzed: gang gis he yig mi shes pa //
translated: Those who do not know the syllable he

original: srid par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: srid par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
translated: are yogis who are assembled in existence.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantras,

original: rnal 'byor pa khyod gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa khyod gshin rje'i gshed //
translated: you yogis should practice

original: dmar po'i rgyud chen tshig nyung de //
analyzed: dmar po'i rgyud chen tshig nyung de //
translated: the short words of the great tantra of Red Yamāri.

original: gang gis yongs su ngal med par //
analyzed: gang gis yongs su ngal med par //
translated: Those who are not completely tired

original: bde ba chen po gsungs pa de'i //
analyzed: bde ba chen po gsungs pa de'i //
translated: of the great bliss that is taught

original: bde ba thams cad kun bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kun bsdus pa'o //
translated: are the ones who have gathered all bliss.

original: pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
analyzed: pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
translated: The sixty-four-petaled lotus

original: rgyu bcas ched du rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: rgyu bcas ched du rnal 'byor ma //
translated: is the yoginī with her cause.

original: longs spyod rdzogs las bde ba thob //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs las bde ba thob //
translated: Bliss is obtained from the saṃbhogakāya.

original: spyod cing spyod la de rtse'o //
analyzed: spyod cing spyod la de rtse'o //
translated: One should enjoy and play with her.

original: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
analyzed: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
translated: And the instantaneous perfect enlightenment.

original: gzhan du 'jig rten gsum spyod byed; ;'di ni sku ni bzhi po ste //
analyzed: gzhan du 'jig rten gsum spyod byed; ;'di ni sku ni bzhi po ste //
translated: This is the fourth body,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min //🔽'jig rten 'das pa'i tha snyad kyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min // 'jig rten 'das pa'i tha snyad kyis //
translated: Which is not even the domain of the buddhas.🔽It is taught by the highest yoga

original: rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnam pas bstan //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnam pas bstan //
translated: Through the conventions of transcendence of the world.🔽I have taught the Hevajra

original: 'khor lo bzhi yi rnam @499b pa yis; ;kye yi rdo rjer bdag gis bstan //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi yi rnam @499b pa yis; ;kye yi rdo rjer bdag gis bstan //
translated: Through the forms of the four wheels.

original: sgom pa'i sbyor pa 'dus pa ru //
analyzed: sgom pa'i sbyor pa 'dus pa ru //
translated: In the gathering of the yoga of meditation,

original: rtsa rnams mkha' 'gro ma kun gyis /
analyzed: rtsa rnams mkha' 'gro ma kun gyis /
translated: All the dakinis of the channels

original: 'bras bu'i sgrub thabs kye rdo rjer //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i sgrub thabs kye rdo rjer //
translated: Have taught the means of achieving the result in Hevajra.🔽In which the means of achieving the winds

original: gang du rlung gi sgrub thabs ni; ;nyin dang mtshan ma'i rab dbye la //
analyzed: gang du rlung gi sgrub thabs ni; ;nyin dang mtshan ma'i rab dbye la //
translated: Is the division of day and night.

original: 'dab ma drug cu bzhir dbyug gu //🔽zhes pa 'di dag thun mong gi /
analyzed: 'dab ma drug cu bzhir dbyug gu // zhes pa 'di dag thun mong gi /
translated: The staff is the sixty-four petals.🔽These are to be expressed

original: rab tu dbye bas brjod par bya //
analyzed: rab tu dbye bas brjod par bya //
translated: By the common divisions.🔽Again, the nature of the deity’s form

original: lha yi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can; ;slar yang sku gsung thugs dbye bas //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can; ;slar yang sku gsung thugs dbye bas //
translated: Is the division of body, speech, and mind.🔽One should understand with the mind

original: yig gsum nyid kyi mnyam gzhag pa'i //🔽yid kyis khong du chud par bya //
analyzed: yig gsum nyid kyi mnyam gzhag pa'i //🔽yid kyis khong du chud par bya //
translated: The equipoise of the three syllables.

original: aom yig gis ni 'jug pa dang / a'a:yig gis ni de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: aom yig gis ni 'jug pa dang / a'a:yig gis ni de bzhin gnas //
translated: and by the syllable AḤ, one should abide.

original: h'um yig gis ni dbyung ba yang //

analyzed: rnal 'byor man ngag las bya'o //

analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis //

analyzed: rgyu bcas rgyu med bstan par 'gyur //

analyzed: de las sa bon mtshan ma'ang slar; ;sna rtser mchog tu bsam par bya //

original: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin bya //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin bya //

analyzed: de bzhin bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid //

original: byed med gzugs kyi phreng ba yi //
analyzed: byed med gzugs kyi phreng ba yi //

original: yang yang skad cig skad cig ma //
analyzed: yang yang skad cig skad cig ma //

analyzed: dbye bas kun tu bsam par bya //

original: dag pa'i sku 'di yis ni gang //
analyzed: dag pa'i sku 'di yis ni gang //

analyzed: ye shes brtson pas bsgom par bya //

analyzed: sems can kun ni chos nyid byed // lha yi rnal 'byor 'di nyid ni //

analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs bya //

original: slar yang sngags pas 'jig rten don //
analyzed: slar yang sngags pas 'jig rten don //

analyzed: slar yang yi ge bsgom par @500a *//

analyzed: bya; ;longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sar lan grangs //

analyzed: kun tu nges pa 'ching bas bcing //

original: lag pas nges sbyar steng gis ni //
analyzed: lag pas nges sbyar steng gis ni //

analyzed: yi ges bstan pa'i 'khrul 'khor las //

analyzed: rkyang ma dang ni ro ma yis //

analyzed: dbus su g-yo med 'jug par gyis /

original: sku gsung thugs su nges sbyar nas //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su nges sbyar nas //

analyzed: phyag rgya mchog tu bsam par bya //

analyzed: skad cig de las lhan skyes 'char //

analyzed: bsgom bya 'dir ni the tshom med //

analyzed: don 'di gang gis shes byed pa //

analyzed: blo bzang yid ni mnyam par bzhag /

analyzed: sangs rgyas lam gyi man ngag go //

analyzed: 'jug ngogs chen por khyod bkrus te //

analyzed: de yang gang dang gang 'gro ba //

analyzed: der ni sangs rgyas 'ong bar byed //

original: kun tu byang chub sems dpa' nyid //
analyzed: kun tu byang chub sems dpa' nyid //

analyzed: sna tshogs sems can phan par byed //

analyzed: ha har dgod par gyis shig ces // phyogs bcur rnam par gnas ba yis //

analyzed: bdud rnams kun tu 'bros par byed //

original: thal me sbyar bar byas nas ni //
analyzed: thal me sbyar bar byas nas ni //

analyzed: khyed zhabs kun gyis 'dud par byed //

analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs 'chang bud med ni //

analyzed: sna tshogs 'dod pas 'khrugs par rig /

analyzed: btsogs ma til mchog ma la sogs //

analyzed: bkug nas rdzogs par longs spyod byed //

analyzed: ces pas gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i @500b rgyud du rlung gi de nyid de le'u bcu bzhi pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas rlung gi rnam grangs ni //

analyzed: rab tu phye nas bshad kyi nyon /

analyzed: rigs kyi dbyug gu so gnyis la //

analyzed: thun tshod bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin //

analyzed: thun gcig dbyug gu lhag pa la //

analyzed: thun phyed dbyug gu bzhi yin te; ;des ni rim pa bzhin 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mor rim pas kyang //

analyzed: skad cig thang cig sogs dbye las; ;rnam pa bzhi ru de brjod do //

analyzed: de bzhin dga' ba bzhi po ste //

analyzed: 'og la 'khor lo bzhi yod de //

analyzed: de yang sku ni bzhi pa yin //

analyzed: dga' ba bzhi la mtshon pa yang //

original: srid pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa ni /

original: skye ba ni /
analyzed: skye ba ni /
translated: Birth is

analyzed: slar yang phung po la nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //

original: rga shi ni /
analyzed: rga shi ni /

analyzed: me long sgra dang nyi ma 'pho //

analyzed: sa bon las ni phung po 'di //

analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba dang 'pho ba med //

analyzed: 'dir brjod yan lag bcu gnyis ni //

analyzed: khyad par thub pas bstan pa yin //

analyzed: ji ltar rten cing yang dag 'byung //
